An answer to Mr. Hobbs his Leviathan with observations, censures, and confutations of divers errours, beginning at the seventeenth chapter of that book / by William Lucy ... Lucy, William, 1594-1677.
[6], 236, 32, [17] p.
Printed by S.G. and B.G. for Edward Man ..., London : 1673.
First ed. Cf. NUC pre-1956. Errata on p. [17] at end. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Includes index.
